mapper.insert: insert into todo (title, details, isCompleted, completionDate, category, isDeleted, expectedCompletionDate,isImportant,isUrgent) VALUES (#{title},#{details},#{isCompleted},#{completionDate},#{category},#{isDeleted},#{expectedCompletionDate},#{isImportant},#{isUrgent})
mapper.select: select * from todo WHERE id = #{id} And isDeleted = 0
SELECT * FROM todo WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') And isDeleted = 0
